data.title: Melaleuca JP
data.brief: The largest online wellness shopping club for the Japanese market. Melaleuca is an international wellness and direct marketing company founded in 1985, offering over 450 health, personal care, and home care products

data.title: Melaleuca KR
data.brief: The largest online wellness shopping club for the Korean market. Melaleuca is an international wellness and direct marketing company founded in 1985, offering over 450 health, personal care, and home care products

data.title: InSense
data.brief: A Luxury perfume ecommerce website, built with React, Express, and MySql

data.title: Tarotpedia
data.brief: A Tarot card dictionary with a simple search feature. You can also draw your tarot cards and get your card readings

data.title: Todo App
data.brief: A To-Do list application using CRUD functionality and built with react

data.title: iTube
data.brief: A simplified version of YouTube, without ads or distracting comments, integrated with the YouTube API.
